page.title: 14Local News in Knypersley.
page.content: A pupil of Park Middle School appeared on the television programme "Jim'll Fix It". A polce community programme,S.P.A.C.E, aimed at providing entertainment for youngsters during the summer holidays was well supported.. The arrival of a new headmaster at the High School coincided with increased action in support of the teachers dispute. There was an arson attack on the house of a pupil of the High School.The girl's mother was killed and a murder hunt is underway.Many believe it may have been connected with the miner's strike. A local football team,the Knypersley Vics,have won the Staffordshire Senior League Cup.
